subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: One fan waiting to see if Alex Rodriguez will supplant Barry Bonds’s home run record is Warren E. Buffett, who holds a position in the financial world similar to the one Rodriguez occupies in baseball.
snippet: One fan waiting to see if Alex Rodriguez will supplant Barry Bonds’s home run record is Warren E. Buffett, who holds a position in the financial world similar to the one Rodriguez occupies in baseball.
